title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument: Park Statistics
body: Park Statistics        A winter sunset on the Ajo Mountains         The following reports are available on the NPS Stats Website. Year to Date Reports Monthly Public Use Reports Annual Monument Visitation (all years) Visitation by Month/ Year Monument Fiscal Year Report How We Count Visitation       Total Acreage Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument is composed of 516 square miles or 330,689 square acres.
